bot_username_desc: Select a bot to send message
increase_dayoff_per_month_desc: Example: Add extra 1 dayoff per month
total_wfh_per_month_desc: Example: Add extra 2 wfh days per month
requestOff_before_desc: The request to Off should be sent before X hours or get warning
requestWfh_before_desc: The request to WFH should be sent before X hours or get warning
requestLate_before_desc: The request to Late/End Soon should be sent before X hours or get warning
schedule_log_time_desc: Schedule log off information everyday at this time
limit_late_time_desc: Limit late duration before get warning
